attributes.action: Remove speed bumps to reduce C02 Emissions and reduce wear and tear on cars
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Did you know that according to the Transport Research Laboratory in the United Kingdom emissions on roads with a 75 metre hump spacing increased emissions by 70–80%, Hydro-carbons by 70–100%, and CO2 by 50–60%. 

So why are we enforcing traffic calming measures like this when it is damaging our environment, damaging our cars and often cause more accidents than reduce them.

Currently it appears that most council want to introduce speed bumps into residential areas. This means that every single home owner who does not live on a main road is going to produce higher levels of CO2 just by leaving there home to commute to work.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
